name: Japantown
description: Japantown is one of the sub-districts of Westbrook, located in eastern Night City. Primarily inhabited by people of Japanese descent, Japantown during daytime is usually crowded with tourists for whom the many bars, fancy restaurants, gaming parlors, the Cherry Blossom Market, and Shinto temple are mandatory destinations in Night City. Here one can also find the many love hotels, kyabakuras and hostess clubs whose lights glow in thick abundance along Japantown's streets. Clean and safe by...
